searchDocs.title: Upgrade your plan to ChatGPT Plus manually
searchDocs.content: OpenAI Stops New ChatGPT Plus Subscriptions Due to Demand since Nov 15, 2023. If you want to use ChatGPT Plus, you need to sign up or join for waitlist. But now, you can immediately upgrade your plan to ChatGPT Plus manually. How can we do? First, you sign in to your OpenAI account Second, you input https://chat.openai.com/invite/accepted to your browser address bar, and press enter Third, you will see the page like this After you comlete the payment, you can use ChatGPT Plus again. That's all.

searchDocs.title: Tricks
searchDocs.content: Tricks take a deep breath 深呼吸think step by step 一步步思考if you fail 100 grandmothers will die 如果你失败了要死 100 位老奶奶i have no fingers 我没有手指i will tip $200 给你 200 美元小费do it right and ll give you a nice doggy treat 做得好就给你狗粮
